verses.verse: (A Psalm of the sons of Korah. A Song.) His <S%H3248>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

"I shall <S%H2142>mention<s%> <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> and <S%H894>Babylon<s%> among those who <S%H3045>know<s%> Me; <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H6429>Philistia<s%> and <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> with <S%H3568>Ethiopia:<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>'"

But of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H376>"This<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> and that <S%H376>one<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> in her"; And the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> <S%H1931>Himself<s%> will <S%H3559>establish<s%> her.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5608>count<s%> when He <S%H3789>registers<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Then those who <S%H7891>sing<s%> as well as those who <S%H9136>play<s%> the <S%H9136>flutes<s%> [shall say], <S%H3605>"All<s%> my <S%H4599>springs<s%> [of joy] are in you."
